scans.title: LABEL CREATED
scans.desc: A shipping label appeared. Bing Bong stared at it like it owed him money.

scans.title: SHIPPED
scans.desc: Parcel departed. Bing Bong yelled “WE RIDE!” and immediately regretted it.

scans.title: INCIDENT: PLANE CRASH
scans.desc: Bad news: crash. Good news: Bing Bong appointed himself Head Scout by force of squeak.

scans.title: SURVIVAL: SHORE CAMP
scans.desc: Bing Bong declared a “short rest”. Everyone complied. Nobody remembers voting.

scans.title: BIOME ENTERED: TROPICS
scans.desc: Humidity 100%. Morale 3%. Bing Bong’s squeak echoes through the rainforest like a warning.

scans.title: BIOME ENTERED: ROOTS
scans.desc: Wind, vertical nonsense, and root geometry. Bing Bong is clinging on with pure audacity.

scans.title: BIOME ENTERED: MESA
scans.desc: Hot sun, big canyon energy. Bing Bong attempted a straight-line route and was humbled immediately.

scans.title: BIOME ENTERED: ALPINE
scans.desc: Blizzards. Ice. Regret. Bing Bong is wearing imaginary gloves and insisting it helps.

scans.title: BIOME ENTERED: CALDERA
scans.desc: Lava. Heat warnings. Bing Bong filed a formal complaint with the volcano.

scans.title: CHECKPOINT: THE KILN
scans.desc: Everything is on fire conceptually. Bing Bong is now spiritually toasted.

scans.title: SUMMIT: THE PEAK
scans.desc: Summit reached. Flare logic engaged. Bing Bong posed heroically in wind (real or imagined).

scans.title: EXTRACTION IN PROGRESS
scans.desc: Helicopter inbound. Bing Bong is acting calm, but his stitching is lying.

scans.title: DELIVERED ✅
scans.desc: Bing Bong has arrived. He requests snacks, a warm shelf, and to be praised like a tiny hero.

dispatch: Bing Bong tried to sign the shipping label himself. He wrote: “SCOUT”. That’s legally binding now.
Bing Bong is auditing bubble wrap like it’s a rare resource. He hoarded all of it. No regrets.
Bing Bong demanded express shipping, then remembered he doesn’t have money. He offered a pebble.
Bing Bong stared at the printer for 12 minutes straight. The printer blinked first.
Bing Bong is practicing his heroic pose for the unboxing. He is… doing his best.
shipped: Bing Bong is in transit and yelling “WHEEEE” internally. Externally: complete plush silence.
Bing Bong has declared the parcel a ‘co-op run’. The courier did not consent.
Bing Bong attempted stamina management. He spent it all on vibes before leaving the depot.
crash: Bing Bong has survived an aviation incident and immediately formed a union.
Bing Bong crawled from the wreckage, looked at the island, and whispered: “vertical…?”
Bing Bong is holding a pretend clipboard and blaming ‘weather’ with confidence.
Bing Bong tried to file a claim with BingBong Airlines. The island has no customer service desk.
Bing Bong discovered sand. He is now 40% sand and 60% attitude.
shore: Bing Bong found coconuts (allegedly). He cannot open them (definitely).
Bing Bong started a campfire. Nobody knows how. Nobody questions it.
Bing Bong placed a ‘checkpoint’ that is spiritually meaningful and mechanically questionable.
Bing Bong is using the wreckage wing as a grill. Dinner is: chaos.
Bing Bong tried to recruit a crab as a party member. Negotiations failed.
tropics: Bing Bong is sweating emotionally. The humidity is doing the rest.
Bing Bong heard jungle noises and immediately pretended to be asleep.
Bing Bong attempted stealth. He squeaked. Stealth ended.
Bing Bong is bargaining with a vine: “I hold you, you don’t betray me.”
Bing Bong found a suitcase and screamed internally like it’s legendary loot.
Bing Bong is convinced every leaf is a trap. He might be right.
Bing Bong is rating the Tropics: 2/10, too wet, not enough snacks.
roots: Bing Bong is clinging to roots with the confidence of someone who has never met gravity properly.
Bing Bong tried to climb in a straight line. The Roots laughed.
Bing Bong is fighting wind with pure spite. The wind is winning.
Bing Bong has declared himself “Head Scout”. Nobody voted. Everyone is tired.
Bing Bong is using a root as a phone to call for help. Reception: none. Drama: infinite.
Bing Bong has discovered ‘vertical geometry’ and does not support it.
Bing Bong is whispering motivational quotes to himself. They are all threats.
mesa: Bing Bong looked at the canyon and said: “I can make that.” He cannot.
Bing Bong tried to negotiate with the sun. The sun ignored him professionally.
Bing Bong is collecting dust like it’s an achievement badge.
Bing Bong attempted a long jump and immediately revised the plan to ‘small careful wiggles’.
Bing Bong is pretending he has sunglasses. He does not. He is still cool.
Bing Bong declared the Mesa ‘easy mode’. The Mesa took that personally.
Bing Bong wants a Scout Cannon. Bing Bong should not be trusted with a Scout Cannon.
alpine: Bing Bong is shivering theatrically to gain sympathy buffs.
Bing Bong tried to warm up by thinking warm thoughts. He thought of snacks. It helped 0.2%.
Bing Bong is angry at snow. Snow is unbothered.
Bing Bong attempted to build a tiny snowman. It became a tiny snow tragedy.
Bing Bong is using imaginary mittens and insisting they are ‘legendary gear’.
Bing Bong declared a blizzard ‘just wind with opinions’. Bold. Incorrect.
Bing Bong is climbing ice like it owes him money.
caldera: Bing Bong saw lava and immediately filed a complaint with the concept of heat.
Bing Bong is tiptoeing around hot rocks like a cartoon burglar.
Bing Bong asked the volcano for a ‘less spicy route’. The volcano refused.
Bing Bong invented a new strategy called “don’t be near lava”. Revolutionary.
Bing Bong is threatening the magma with strongly worded squeaks.
Bing Bong is currently experiencing ‘burning power increases’ emotionally.
Bing Bong is insisting the Caldera is ‘character building’. He is becoming a villain.
kiln: Bing Bong is spiritually toasted and physically fine. Mentally: questionable.
Bing Bong tried to roast a marshmallow. He does not have marshmallows. He has audacity.
Bing Bong is walking like everything is hot (because it is).
Bing Bong is doing the ‘hold breath and sprint’ technique. It’s not working. He can’t breathe.
Bing Bong is chanting “up up up” like it’s a spell. It might be.
Bing Bong has accepted the Kiln as punishment for past arrogance.
peak: Bing Bong reached the top and immediately tried to light the flare with pure confidence. It worked (somehow).
Bing Bong is posing at the summit like a tiny action hero who pays zero rent.
Bing Bong is shouting “RESCUE!” in plush silence. The universe heard him anyway.
Bing Bong is refusing to come down. He says this is his peak era.
Bing Bong looked into the horizon and said: “I forgive the plane. I don’t.”
extraction: Bing Bong heard rotor blades and instantly pretended he was calm the whole time.
Bing Bong is practicing a dignified rescue wave. It looks like a panic flap.
delivered: Bing Bong has arrived and is immediately requesting snacks as payment for services rendered.
Bing Bong is now in Pev’s care. He demands praise, shelf space, and gossip.
Bing Bong is looking around like: “So… where’s the next mountain?”
unknown: Bing Bong is currently off-grid, gathering supplies and emotional resilience.
